content: in each of next 3 single_crochet ch6 repeat from * 2 more times end with slip_stitch in tip of next petal ch2 double_crochet in tip of next petal turn 19 ch2 counts as first double_crochet double_crochet in next 2 chs * double_crochet in next slip_stitch double_crochet in next 6 chain double_crochet in next 3 single_crochet double_crochet in next 6 chs repeat from * 2 more times end with double_crochet in next slip_stitch double_crochet in next 3 chain 55 sts turn 20 ch2 double_crochet in each double_crochet to end of row turn 21 repeat step 19 until 44 row of double_crochet have been worked or to desired length fasten_off yarn copyright 2022 lisa hounshell
